question: What strategies do you use to improve Shopify site speed?
answer:
We use a variety of strategies to improve your Shopify site speed, including:
  • Image optimisation
  • Code analysis and optimisation
  • Third-party tools review
  • Minimizing file requests

These are some general strategies, however every store is different. Our team reviews your store to find the specific issues hurting your store so they know exactly what needs to be changed to improve your site's speed.
